column1: the class was too fast and skipped important topics
i loved how clear the teacher explained each concept
assignments were confusing and instructions were unclear
the course materials were well organized and easy to follow
feedback took too long and arrived after the deadline
examples were practical and helped me understand better
lectures were boring and felt repetitive
discussion sessions were engaging and interactive
grading felt unfair and criteria were not transparent
rubrics were detailed and grading was consistent
the pace was perfect and not overwhelming
the pace was too slow for me
slides were cluttered and hard to read
slides were clean and very readable
the lab support was excellent and timely
i struggled to get help during labs
teacher encouraged questions and participation
teacher rarely answered questions in detail
group work was well coordinated
group work lacked coordination and clarity
quizzes matched the lectures well
quizzes did not reflect what was taught
recorded lectures were very helpful
no recordings were available when i missed class
the examples connected theory to real life
too much theory and not enough examples
i appreciated the frequent formative feedback
there was almost no feedback throughout the term
office hours were accessible and useful
office hours were hard to attend and rarely helpful
the learning platform was easy to navigate
the platform kept crashing during submissions
instructions for projects were crystal clear
project requirements kept changing without notice
the teacher was supportive and respectful
some comments felt dismissive and unhelpful
tutorials clarified difficult topics
tutorials were rushed and superficial
practice questions were abundant and relevant
not enough practice questions to prepare
